title: Quarkus Newsletter #23 - August
content: The August Quarkus Newletter has been released! What’s new this month? Plenty! Get a great understanding of OpenTelemetry with Eric Deandrea’s article "OpenTelemetry: A Quarkus Superheroes demo of Observability". Get the good and bad experiences of a developer jumping into the deep end on a project with María Arias de...
